thread.title: Dani Alves wears most DANI ALVES jacket (and shoes) you will ever see at The Best FIFA Football Awards 2016
thread.title_full: Dani Alves wears most DANI ALVES jacket (and shoes) you will ever see at The Best FIFA Football Awards 2016

author: Jake Polden
title: Dani Alves wears most DANI ALVES jacket (and shoes) you will ever see at The Best FIFA Football Awards 2016
text:
Get daily   Could   
Some people like to blend into the background and avoid the press at big events. 
Others like to strut their stuff on the red - in this case green - carpet and pose for a few snaps. 
And some, well, Dani Alves , steals the show. 
In the above video the Juventus right-back is seen turning up The Best FIFA Football Awards in Zurich in absolutely dazzling fashion. 
He wears a leather jacket decorated with sparkling studs and is described by one FIFA TV reporter as a "matador". Dressed to impress (Photo: Getty Images) Alves stands out more than the award (Photo: YouTube/FIFATV) 
Complimenting this fierce look is a pair of equally show-stopping shoes - see for yourself in the above video if you don't believe us. 
This is not the first time the Brazilian has dressed to impressed. 
Remember the time he dressed as Elton John when at Barcelona? Or when he rocked some truly remarkable footwear? 
What a guy!
